title: Word: Editor using Context IQ Inline search within documents
description: Editor using Context IQ allows users to easily search for and insert entities like People or Files in their document while staying in flow. When users type the “@“ key, a menu will appear that allows them to search for, filter, and insert entities that exist across their Microsoft 365 account. Languages supported: English. Additional language support and support for Viva Topics and Loops will be coming in the future.
